reviewText: Omg....this has got to be one of the worst movies I have ever watched.  I kept fast forwarding thinking it may get better...but it didn't...at all!  I can't believe I stuck it out to the end!
Kept watching to see if it could possibly get worse! And it did. Great assembly of equally untalented actors and wretched dialog.
I found this movie had the worse dialogue and the movie left much to be desired.  I managed to watch it to the end, however, it really was a waste of time.

This is, by far, the most perfect match of bad dialogue with bad acting I've ever seen twenty minutes of.  Couldn't bear any more than that.
In a word, this film  is silly. Impossible to take seriously. If you watch and hate it, I told you so.
It was pretty good, not great. It did hold my interest so that I watched the entire movie. worth watching.

I like this movie disspite the negative comm
nts it has gotten, the actors were very believeable. It was a intresting plot yes a little different but enjoyable.

I cannot believe anyone spent money making this film.  Worse, I can't believe I paid to rent it.  This is, without question, the worst movie I have ever seen.  The plot is ridiculous, but that's not uncommon.  The acting is horrific.  They couldn't try to be bad and, well, be that bad.  The lighting and sound are awful.
It was a little on the dark side Aside from being a little gory it was also kind of exotic
Only watch a few minutes it's so bad
So bad I couldn't even watch more than half
don't bother
Overdone and predictable.
Good and exciting movie with a great ending.
it was ok start but too repetitious of similar movie stopped watching it after 10 min.
Kind  of a boring story, I like more action and this was not an action movie.
I did not like it. It was purely a torture movie.
This movie was a disaster! Long drawn out boring scenes of a crazy woman holding a cheating husband and his wife hostage. It was a waste of ninety minutes of my life!!!
Fair at best, poor acting
waste of money.
Some Movies are good, not all.
Horrible acting. Watched about 10 minutes and lost interest.
Story is boring. This is the worst movie I have seen in a long time. It is only about torture. It is about the worst fatal attraction that might happen. It sucks.
I didn't like it much
terrible story line, I didn't watch the whole movie
I did not like this movie at all.  It was more of a horror film and not what I expected.

What a total waste of my time!  I agree with all the other reviewers...by far the dumbest, most boring movie I've ever seen in my life.  Horrible acting...drawn out to the point of boredom!  I can't believe this movie was ever made.  Don't waste your time or curiosity....it STINKS.
not much.

I did not watch the whole movie as I do not like violence and torture in my film watching.  The mistress had the guy chained up and was pulling out his fingernails with a pliers and I got out of there then; cant stand stuff like that.
There are a lot of crazy people in the world, makes you think twice before having an affair.
Really good story.  Thank you.
cinematography was awful....
To much bad language
worst acting in the history of tv
stupid movie. The first 5 minutes turned me off.
Way too violent for me
Lousy acting, too violent equals trash. I fast forwarded past the violence.
Art does not always imitate life and this movie is a far cry from it; nuff said.
can't believe I kept watching
didn't really care for this movie
100% not compared to the movie Fatal Attraction.  However, this movie had a plot, but it was acted out and played out horribly.
Violent and really weak story line. Pass.
A perfect mess, worst acting, filming , storyline. I hope no one actually paid money to see this because if you did, you have been ripped off.
Grotesque, insipid, and infantile.  This movie is one of the most ridiculous, poorly acted, wastes of time, money and effort I have ever seen in my entire life.
It was okay but not something I would watch more than one time. I liked the plot but I was hoping for a better ending.

Easily falls into one of the worst movies I have ever watched. Watched it late at night without reading the reviews. The beginning was bad and I was hoping it would get better. Unfortunately it got much worse. Don't know how this movie saw the day of light. It should have been killed the moment someone read the script.

Poor story, poor cinematography, mostly poor acting. Ironically, the one redeeming factor is the woman who played the villain - she truly acted like one.
This dumb, dumb movie is so awful I couldn't stand to watch it to the finish.  I couldn't care less how it ended.
I watched it almost all the way through.  The torture scene lasted too long.  The film was too dark.  I would recommend that time not be wasted on this film.
I totally enjoyed this movie. Great thriller with a good twist. Revenge was another plot twist, but to dark. Hard to see

Don't be fooled by this being listed as a Thriller. It's mainly going for freaky elements despite advertising itself as a FATAL ATTRACTION clone. The music and lighting holds tons of promise but the actors are far more stale than what you see in a porn flick and the movie bring nothing new to the table for even audiences with low-expectations or even typical indie film gurus. There's a reason this is only on AMAZON PRIME! It's too bad to be released on even DVD.

I saw this wanting simple entertainment and since it was a movie that starred Joe Estevez! He unfortunately was nowhere to be seen and I suspect either had all his scenes cut or was one of the voice-overs on the radio at the beginning but bad is still bad! PLEASE AVOID, it's not even unintentionally amusing as you'll likely fall asleep an hour in or just not know where to poke fun at it to begin with!

Yes, I noticed all the horrible reviews before I started to watch this movie, but I have to admit - I enjoy a bad movie from time to time.  It's like a train wreck where you can't avert your eyes.  This movie, however, was so bad that it couldn't even be appreciated in the bad movie way.

Spoiler Alert!!!

I have to admit - I watched only the first 20 minutes.  As soon as the mistress put the cheater in the chains, I feared that he was going to stay there for the next 70 minutes, which would be tedious and incredibly boring.  I did the thing I never do - skipped ahead - and saw that at over 100 minutes into the movie, he was still in the chains!  No thank you.  I abandoned the movie right then.  It might be unfair to rate a movie that one has not watched to the end, but in this case I just wasn't going to get there.  Spare yourself by skipping this truly loathsome film.
don't waste your time - it was really really awful - the image quality was terrible, the story pitiful and the acting worse

This director must have been stark raving mad in order to think of the crap in this movie. It would have probably been a good movie had it had better lighting............it was so dark I started to turn off but decided maybe it will lighten up.........that never happened even when I adjusted my set to 100% brightness. The acting was horrible. The script wasn't so bad......had this budget be that of a Quinton T pocketbook this could have probably been a box office smash with a few changes.  Considering they probably didn't have much to make movie I would say watch if you can and judge for yourself. It's not the worst movie I've seen but it's in the worst basket with the worst. They don't need to use the words Fatal Attraction in the advertising as this is not in the same category as Fatal Attraction. Ewwwww is all I will say.............watch for yourself if you can last through it then give your review. I am rating a 3 because I sat through the entire horrible movie..............no I can't do that ..........wish there was a ZERO rating as this is what this movie deserved. Seriously, Johan Earl....................Ewwwwwwww in a yuckie way.
It was so bad I turned it off when it became apparent the bondage scene was not about sex but was about torture

I wanted to see for myself if this film was really as bad as most others said it was.  It was free for me to watch on prime.  It is a very sick plot, that's for certain, and the script could have been better, but it wasn't terrible, and neither was the acting.  It isn't easy for an actor or actress to play a part where they are chained down (or up) for almost the entire film and tortured again and again.  I thought most of the cast in this film did a decent job with what they had to work with.  The so-called music was what was terrible, especially the song during the end credits.  Would I watch it again?  Probably not, but I don't regret watching it the once.

I wish I could rate this with 'zero'.  Poorly written and directed ... the acting SUCKS.  A high school drama class would have been more entertaining. I'm an idiot for sitting through the first fifteen minutes, but kept hoping it would get better.  NOT!  It got worse by the second.  MOVIES THAT ARE THIS INANE SHOULD BE OUTLAWED!  Excuse me while I go puke now.

Do not waste your time, money, or both on this one!  I watched it inspite of the reviews to give it a fair chance and the acting, plot, and story line was way out there!  There was definitely no suspense...every part was predictable and totally unrealistic...Rotten Tomatoes for this one...If you decide to watch this...Just remember...I told you so!  Absolutely nothing like the movie fatal attraction...Totally a low budget film!  Can't say enough bad things about this one!
This was the worst excuse of cinematography, acting, storyline, basically everything, anyone could possibly imagine. Do not waste your time.
like everybody else, it's one big pos.

OMG.  I started watching this movie based on all the bad reviews, curious to see if it could really be as awful as they say.  Let me tell you, it is WORSE!  I really think Amazon should give the nuclear option of giving 0 stars.  Sometimes it is SO necessary.  I watched till the novelty of awesome badness grew stale, then quit.  I have rarely seen a movie in which EVERY element is hideous: the acting, writing, editing, sound, cinematography (I even hate to give it such a professional-sounding name), directing, lighting, sets, etc., etc.--EVERYTHING!  Plus, I'm fully convinced they accidently left out an entire reel, as the continuity at one point is so inexplicable, there can be no other explanation.  The sordid, repellent storyline tops it off.  This is not a horror film--rather a horror of a film.
What a terrible movie.  Waste of time.
Porn yuch
I wish I had read the reviews first.
beyond horrible.could only take 25 minutes.
I withdrew early in the film progression.  Not into torture.
Weird!
Crazy movie.
Very poor acting . Silly plot
